critique: The document is a formal executive order regarding the ability of federal employees residing in Arlington County, VA to hold local office. The primary emotion conveyed is a sense of formal authorization and regulation. There is a slight sense of joy that the residents are allowed to participate in local government. There is no indication of sadness, fear, disgust, or surprise. The initial scores reflect this assessment. The revised scores are the same as the initial scores, as the initial assessment is accurate.
